name: HOME ARMY WARS
description:
Home Army Wars - play as a general of the green toy soldier’s army! Save your owner house from the oncoming bug invasion. Green Toy Soldiers unite, Bug Invasion has begun!

Use your versatile infantry, support troops, armored vehicles, deadly aircrafts and powerful artillery to fight off the invasion of bugs. Home Army Wars - action packed green men battle grounds.

Stop the enemy invasion room by room, fighting bugs and Blue Toy Soldiers! Attack enemy’s convoys, defend bases, protect surrounded recon squads using a powerful gunship, special weapons and more to win the War.
